revised_title: Exploring the Properties and Behavior of a Mass of Cells Capable of Regenerating Pulses
tldr: The article investigates the properties and behavior of a mass of cells with properties similar to neurons. It examines various forms of activity, including plane waves, and how the propagation of activity depends on cell properties. The mass of cells can exhibit behavior similar to living organisms, demonstrating trial and error learning, conditioned responses, and the ability to regenerate past events.
